title: Ticket #3331: startd exception when matched while in drained state
description:
A race condition can result in the startd receiving a match info message from the negotiator for a slot that is in the Drained state. A slot in this state cannot be matched, so the negotiator must have been working with an older version of the slot ad from before it entered this state.

When this happens, the startd EXCEPTs with the following message: 

   ERROR "match_info() called with unexpected state (Drained)" at line 2082 in file /slots/05/dir_12000/userdir/src/condor_startd.V6/command.cpp

This problem was observed at Fermilab.
remarks: Review: changes look good to me.
check_ins: 2012-Nov-20 11:50   Check-in [34158]: Fixed exception in statd when receiving match info while in Drained state. #3331 (By Dan Bradley )
creator: danb
